oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AQS-BIO : Aliment-Qualité-Sécurité partie Bio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (1 projet) concerns the control of the wheat production and milling techniques for improving nutritionnal value of flour (comparison between organic and conventional wheat). The other part (1 project)is about future trends for the organic market and consumer training.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} AQS-BIO : Aliment-Qualité-Sécurité partie Bio. [Food-Quality-Security Organic part.] Runs 2001 - 2004. Programme Leader(s): François, Martine; Sylvander, Bertil; Viaux, Philippe and Rémésy, Christian.
